content.question: In the last sentence of the fifth paragraph, the author refers to “wikis and forums” in order to

choices.label: distinguish online gaming from other forms of online interaction
illustrate a point about the ease of collaboration enabled by the Internet
suggest that multiauthored documents tend to be less reliable than single-authored ones
argue that certain Internet environments are better than others for creating new games

content.answer: illustrate a point about the ease of collaboration enabled by the Internet
